short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides histogram, activity from friends, and reviews panels on unwatched Letterboxd film pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides histogram, activity from friends, and reviews panels on unwatched Letterboxd film pages to help with the review bias when browsing for movies. Inspired by the complaints on Reddit about such a setting being missing on Letterboxd settings.
